name: C. Fence Painting
statement:
You finally woke up after this crazy dream and decided to walk around to
clear your head. Outside you saw your house’s fence so plain and boring,
that you’d like to repaint it. You have a fence consisting of n planks,
where the i-th plank has the color a_i. You want to repaint the fence in
such a way that the i-th plank has the color b_i.You’ve invited m
painters for this purpose. The j-th painter will arrive at the moment j
and will recolor plank to color c_j. For each painter you can choose
which plank to recolor, but you can’t turn them down, i. e. each painter
has to color exactly one plank.Can you get the coloring b you want? If
it’s possible, print for each painter which plank he must paint.
